11.content: What will happen to the courageous pup?
11.title: Lucky

111.content: Will it be age progression, age regression or both?
111.title: Age Progression/Regression

1111.content: How will he undergo the change?
1111.title: Age Progression

choices: He turns back into a puppy and shows the Wishing Bone to his friends
He turns back into a puppy and shows the Wishing Bone to his parents
11112.content:
Lucky was busy as usual on the farm. He was currently practicing digging up bones trying to outdig his step-brother Tripod.

As he digged into the ground, Lucky unearthed a glowing bone. He grew curious seeing it.

"Wow, what a wierd looking bone" he said.

Lucky noticed an inscription on the bone and read it: "Whoever holds this bone can make any wish of their's come true." Lucky blinked as ideas flew into his head.

"I wonder if it really works?" Lucky eyed the bone before deciding to show it off to the other pups. He raced back home to the farm and tried to show it off to the others, only for them to disbelieve that the bone was 'magical'. Lucky was sure that his best friends, Cadpig, Rolly and Spot would believe him, but he couldn't find them anywhere. Then he remembered that it was their turn at the vet, which was why they weren't here.

Finding nobody else with interest in the 'Wishing Bone', as he had started calling it, Lucky wondered how to prove the bone was real, eventually deciding on making a wish himself. But what should he wish for? After a bit of thinking, he got an idea.

"Hey, why do I have to wait many years before I become an adult?" he said to himself. "With this Wishing Bone, I can become one right now! Not permanently, of course; just for a little while. It could be fun to try."

Touching the Wishing Bone with a paw, Lucky proclaimed: "I wish I could be an adult!"

As the Wishing Bone started to glow, Lucky could feel his body changing. His paws got bigger and his legs got longer. His tail also elongated, while his chest and body puffed up with muscles to support his new body-mass. Lucky had to close his eyes, as the changes reached his head. He could feel it, as his face got bigger, while his muzzle and his ears got longer.

When the changes stopped, Lucky opened his eyes again. The first thing he saw, was that the Wishing Bone had stopped glowing. The second thing he saw, was his much bigger paw on top of the Bone, encouraging the puppy to look at the rest of his body.

Only, he wasn't a puppy anymore. Lucky had changed into a fully grown, adult dalmatian!

"This is awesome! The Wishing Bone really works!" said Lucky in his new deeper voice, as he looked his adult body over. "So, this is what it feels like to be an adult! I love it! I'm as tall as my dad and I feel really strong, too!"

As he walked in circles to get a better look at himself, Lucky suddely stumbled and fell down on his stomach.

"Well, I guess I'm not fully used to my new hight and longer legs yet," mused Lucky, as he got back up. He then looked at the Wishing Bone. "This will prove that I was telling the truth! The Bone really is magical!"

Lucky was about to pick up the Wishing Bone with his mouth, when a thought occured to him.

"Hold on! If I show up as an adult, the others might not believe that it's me! I'd better turn back into a puppy before I go see anyone! Besides, my friends are probably back from the vet now, so I could show them what this Bone can do. Then again, perhaps I should tell my parents about this first; they might know where the Bone came from!"

What does Lucky decide to do?
11112.title: A magical wishing bone

choices: Take a dip in the pond
111131.content:
It was one hot afternoon as Lucky was trekking the swamp out of boredom while being shaded by the canopy of the trees and dodging any mucky pools along the way. He always wanted to know what it would be like if he was older. He thought about more freedom and maybe be able to go out on adventures esp. as a stray. Or maybe could become like his childhood hero Thunderbolt on TV and be able to rescue people and beat villains. He just doesn't want to be a kid anymore and didn't have the patience for it. After some 15 or so minutes thinking to himself, he realized he had gone deep farther in the swamp than he ever did. The area around him was unfamiliar, and it would be risky go further without getting lost so he decided to go back.

When he was about to head back, his eye caught something. To his right, there was a small pond shimmering in the patches of sunlight that broke through the canopy. He decided to take a closer look at it. The waters were clean and crystal blue, and he could see his reflection clearly as well. It seemed to been untouched by any creatures dwelling here. It looked safe to drink from and to take a dip in. The heat of the day was beginning to be intense and was affecting Lucky to pant a bit despite being shaded by trees. So Lucky then.....
111131.title: Pond of Age

1111312.content:
Lucky decided to take a dip, but first he wanted to feel how cold the water is. He placed his front left paw into the water. It felt cool, not too cold nor too warm. He then took the plunge. The water felt welcoming in his fur, and it was very enticing to say the least. "This feels very refreshing! I should tell the guys to come here next time." Lucky said to himself. He continued swimming for awhile, and then just floated on his back. He sighed in relief in relaxation. Then the pond began to shimmer and glow for a moment, and Lucky felt growing warm sensation throughout his entire body....

What happens next?
1111312.title: Take a dip in the pond

11113121.content: Was the aging process instantaneously or gradual?
11113121.title: He started to age

11113122.content: Who was looking for him?
11113122.title: Someone was looking for him

choices: They continued to swim some more
111131221.content:
Cadpig was walking through the thick swampy woods, looking for Lucky since she was worried about him and was gone for a long time than usual. She managed to catch his scent and followed his trail. While walking farther away from the farm, she was into heavy thought. Like Lucky, she did had thoughts about being an adult and oddly enough thought about who will be her mate. Though she was broken out of her thoughts when she heard splashing. She then went to the direction of the sound and after some time, she came across a clue blue pool with Lucky floating on his back, looking very relaxed. Though something was very off about him. Did he look a bit taller than usual or was it just her imagination?

She then called out to him. "Hey, Lucky! What are you doing here?" "Oh hi, Cadpig. I'm just chillin' in the water. It feels nice. Why don't you come in?" Lucky said with his voice seeming a slightly deeper. Cadpig was unsure about this, but after awhile, she decided what's the harm and dived right in. The water felt cool in her fur and she felt very relaxed like Lucky as he is right now. The water then started to briefly glow like before. Cadpig then felt a warm sensation throughout her body. She then felt herself getting a bit taller and torso seemed to lengthened a little, but didn't bat an eye at it.

What happens next?
111131221.title: Cadpig

1111312211.content:
Both pups continued to swim and relaxed in the pool, oblivious to what is happening to their bodies. They continued to float on their backs as their legs slowly lengthened and matured and their paws that grew bigger. Their torsos stretched a bit more and Cadpig started to developed dog breasts. Their tails also lengthened as well as they aged. Both of their heads started to mature and change shape and size as their muzzles grew and extended. Their ears were now bigger and so were their teeth.

Then the water started to glow again. Did the water have other effects on the dogs?
1111312211.title: They continued to swim some more

choices: Cadpig, Rolly, and Spot arrive to see Lucky and Two-Tone as adults
Mooch, Dipstick, and Wizzer arrive to see Lucky and Two-Tone as adults
111131222221.content:
"Lucky? Are you here?" Called out a female voice, it was Two-Tone whom emerged and saw the pond, she looked around for Lucky just intime to see him as an adult "Lucky!" she gasped "Your grown up!" she said in shock

"I am aren't I?" Lucky said before he noticed Two-Tone looking down "you ok?" he asked

"Yes but no, see I wanted to talk to you but now your kinda old for me." Two-Tone sighed.

"I know." Lucky picked Two-Tone up by the collar and dunked her into the pond.

"Ah! Lucky!" Two-Tone yelped, she swam out of the pond "what was that for??" she asked before she suddenly began to age into an adult, she gasped "Lucky??" she asked as she heard how different her voice sounded

"Your not to young for me now" Lucky grinned

"Wow so I'm grown up now? cool" Two-Tone wagged her tail.
111131222221.title: Two-Tone arrives

choices: At the farm Pongo and Perdita sees Lucky and Two-Tone
Cruella sees adult Lucky and Two-Tone and plans to dognap them
1111312222211.content:
The two now adult dalmatians stared into each others' eyes but before they could they heard Cadpig, Rolly, and Spot. The three entered the clearing as Lucky and Two-Tone saw them enter, shock and disbelief were on the pups' and Spot's faces.

"Lucky what happened??" Spot asked

"Two-Tone, Lucky, you grew up?? But how??" Cadpig asked

"It's this pool, somehow it made us grow up." Lucky explaned as he and Two-tone approached the smaller pups and Spot.

"B.B.But what will you do now?" Spot asked

"Dunno, but we gotta tell mom and dad about this." Lucky said before he turned to Two-tone. "Coming?" he asked

"Never thought you'd ask" Two-Tone said wagging her tail as she and Lucky went back to the farm.
1111312222211.title: All grown up

1112.content: How will Lucky get younger?
1112.title: Age Regression

choices: Cadpig, Rolly, and Spot discover Baby Lucky and Baby Two-Tone
11121.content:
Lucky started to get hungry as he ran outside to see if any chow was in the tower but as he ran a bag was thrown over him, he struggled inside of it as he was pupnapped.

Lucky soon found himself in P.H. De Vil's lab inside a cage, he wasn't alone as he saw another pup whom was also pupnapped. It was Two-Tone whom was also pupnapped as well. The two pups looked as P.H. was mixing a formula up.

"If this serum works, Cruella will be able to regain her youth, and allow me to resume on my normal experiments" P.H. said as he began to mix a drop of the serum into two bowls of Kanine Crunchies. "But first to test how long the effects will last and since those cowards Jasper and Horace refused I chose you two pups." P.H. shoved the food bowls into the cage. The two pups sniffed the food and tried resisting the urge to eat, but their hunger got the better of them as they ate it all. "Good thing the serum is tasteless" P.H. watched to see if anything happens to the two pups. After a few minutes and no obvious effects P.H. sighed, the serum was a failure "Blast! Oh well back to the drawing board, first off" P.H. opened the cage with the two pups in it and took them out glaring at them "I should have known you two would be uneffected!" He said to the pups angrily but before he could do more, Pongo and perdita arrived, P.H. ran dropping the pups. the four dalmatians soon returned to the farm.

"Glad P.H's serum didn't work Lucky" Two-Tone told Lucky as they headed to the chow tower

"Same here Two-To....." Lucky froze, he suddenly began to feel wierd, Two-Tone also started to feel wierd as they began to shrink, the pups suddenly found themselves smaller than before and younger, both of them wailed loudly.

they had both became babies.
11121.title: Experimental dog chow

choices: Cadpig babysits the baby pups and they waddle off to adventure
the pups waddle off while Cadpig sleeps and have adventures on their own
111211.content:
The loud wailing of the now baby pups caught the attention of Cadpig, Rolly, and Spot. The three ran over to see what it was and froze seeing Lucky and Two-TOne now as babies

the small pups cried and cried, their collars slumped around their shoulders now too big, Two-TOne's ear was being weighted down a bit by her earring which was now alot bigger.

"What happened??" Cadpig asked

"They turned into babies, but how?" Rolly asked

"Well don't look at me, I'm only experienced in chick sitting, not puppy sitting" Spot said

"But your the only one with baby sitting experience Spot, besides we also need to figure out what regressed them too." Cadpig said to her chicken friend.

"Alright but I know I'll regret this, okay first we need to get them into something they will feel comfy in" Spot told them, Cadpig and Rolly ran off. they returned with everything they need for their baby friends.

"Okay we got everything we need, now what?" Rolly asked

"Well, one thing we diaper them before they have an accident infront of us" Spot told Cadpig and Rolly whom both nodded, but they realized niether of them have had experience changing a diaper, luckily Cadpig got a book on babycare as well.

"Okay I'll read the instructions, Rolly you do what I tell you." Cadpig told Rolly

"Okay Cadpig, read away" Rolly started on Lucky s Cadpig read the book.

Cadpig began "First fold out the diaper" Cadpig said, Rolly folded out the disposable diaper. "Next lay baby down on the diaper" Cadpig said, Rolly laid Baby Lucky on the diaper. "Next Rolly, powder the baby" Cadpig said, Rolly nodded and began to sprinkle powder on Baby Lucky's diaper area. "Finally fold up the diaper between the baby's legs and then apply the tabs on the sides and make sure it's snug" Cadpig told Rolly, Rolly followed the instructions as he finished diapering Baby Lucky.

"Aww, it wasn't that hard see?" Cadpig said before she did the same for Baby Two-Tone. The two babies gurgled happily.

"Okay now what should we do?" Spot asked

"First we need to find out what regressed Lucky and Two-TOne, then we find a way to reverse it" Rolly said

"I dunno, they do look kinda cute as babies" Cadpig said as she payed with the two babies

"okay then, me and Rolly will find out what did this, you stay with the babies" Spot and Rolly headed off leaving Cadpig with the babies

"Goo goo" Baby Lucky said before sucking on his thumb
111211.title: Babypup sitting

choices: Baby Lucky and Two-Tone go to the yard sale box
Baby Lucky and Two-Tone head to Mooch's hideout
1112112.content:
Cadpig smiled as she took the baby puppies with her to the barn, she had hoped Rolly and Spot would find a cure or find out who did this to Lucky and Two-Tone, she grabbed a box and put some blankets in it as a makeshift crib and places the baby puppies in it "Now you two stay in here okay?" Cadpig told them "You know I kinda envy you two being babies and all, I can imagine that's how my inner puppy is." Cadpig gave Baby Lucky and Baby Two-Tone some pacifiers to suck on, the pups sucked on them happily. Cadpig couldn't help but coo at them enjoying how cute they are. "Maybe you guys could stay as babies, your just too cute" She said before yawning, she turned the tv on leaving it on Thunderbolt as she fell asleep.

As she slept the babies watched Thunderbolt, their tails wagging with crinkling sounds coming from their diapers. Baby Lucky got an idea "Me do that, me be hewo" he said to Baby Two-Tone

"hehe me help too, me wanna be hewo giwl." Baby Two-Tone said giggling too the two baby puppies climb out of their makeshift crib and waddle out of the barn, they looked around in awe of the place wondering where to head to first
1112112.title: the pups waddle off while Cadpig sleeps and hav...

choices: Lucky and Two-Tone find themselves as babies in the barn
Lucky and Two-Tone find themselves in a nursery as babies
11122.content:
Lucky was busy as usual on the farm, he was busy practicing digging up bones trying to outdig his step-brother Tripod, as he digged into the ground Lucky unearthed a glowing bone, he grew curious seeing it "Wow, what a wierd looking bone" he said. Lucky noticed an inscription on the bone and read it "Whoever holds this bone can make any wish of their's come true." Lucky blinked as ideas flew into his head. "I wonder if it really works?" Lucky eyed the bone before deciding to show it off, he raced back home to the farm and tried to show it off to the other pups, finding nobody else with interest Lucky wondered how to prove the bone was real, he decided on making a wish.

But Lucky had no clue on what to wish for till Two-tone walked up seeing the bone, she noticed the glow and approached it and Lucky. "So this the bone you were talking about?" Asked Two-tone, Lucky nodded

"Yeah but nobody believes me that it can grant wishes unless I make one." Lucky told Two-Tone, she smiled as she pawed the bone in Lucky's paws.

"Maybe we can make a wish, together just the two of us." Two-Tone told Lucky

"Okay, maybe you can make the first one" Lucky handed her the bone

"okay, you know? I always wondered what would happen if life were different for us, you know? If we never got pupnapped by Cruella, but then again I wish what life would be like if we were babies, I bet it would be...." Two-Tone gasped realizing while she was talking she made a wish, before the two pups realize it the bone glowed brightly causing a bright flash.
11122.title: The Wishing Bone

choices: An anthromorphic Perdita walked into the nursery to check on the babies
A caretaker walked into the nursery to check on the babies
111222.content:
As the flash faded Lucky and Two-tone realized they weren't in the barn, or for that matter on the farm. They realized they were in some kind of nursery. The pups also realized they were in diapers and wearing baby clothes. It was then they realized they became babies.

"Two-Tone, I think your wish came true.." Lucky said as he looked around the nursery "We're babies!" he yelped

"Wow, I didn't think we'd actually be babies." Two-Tone said a bit surprised. "Wait where's the bone?" Two-tone asked, she and Lucky looked for the bone but didn't see it anywhere.

Just then the door opened as ....
111222.title: A new life

choices: After finishing their milk, the pups start to play
After finishing their milk, the Caretaker comes back in
1112222.content:
Lucky and Two-Tone perked up their ears and turned to see that a caretaker walked through the door. "Who's she?" The horseshoed pup asked as he watched her, Two-Tone shook her head not knowing who the caretaker is either. "Don't know." She replied.

The caretaker walked over to Lucky and Two-Tone. "How are you puppies doing today?" She asked, however both Lucky and Two-Tone just tilted their heads not knowing who she was, what she's suppose to be doing, or where they were as she smiled at them. "Don't be shy, you two." She responded in a friendly voice. "I'm not going to hurt you." She showed her hand to Lucky and Two-Tone allowing them to sniff her, and so they did.

"See, I won't hurt you." She spoke as she walked over to the changing table and took out the two baby bottles that were filled with milk, she opened up the lid and revealed the nipple of the bottles, as she walked back to Lucky and Two-Tone, handing them the bottles.

Lucky and Two-Tone sniffed the bottles as well, the aroma of the bottles told them it was actually safe to drink them as they took the bottles from the caretaker's hands and started drinking from them. "There now, I'll be back to check up on you two later." She spoke with a smile on her face, she walked over to the door and walked out.

Both pups drank their milk while trying to conjure up what just happened, all they knew was that they both made a wish and here they are, drinking milk from a baby bottle as well as wearing diapers around their waists still curious of where that bone got off to and if their friends and family are worried sick about them.

Just then...
1112222.title: A caretaker walked into the nursery to check on...

choices: One of Mooch's goons show up.
1141.content: Lucky was watching cartoons on TV and suddenly, he saw a black cat blowing on his tail to grow big enough to scare the dog away. Lucky thought to himself, "I wonder if I should do it to?" He grabbed his tail, took a deep breath and blew on his tail. Then, the air rushed into his body and grew. Lucky stopped blowing and looked at the TV. "Wow," he said while looking at a reflection of himself on the screen, "I grew big just like the cartoon cat did." Then, he saw Mooch and his gang walking by. Then, he thought to himself, "Maybe I can blow big enough to scare Mooch and his gang." He grabbed his tail again and took another deep breath. His chest puffed up as his inhaled. Then, he blew on his tail so hard, that he grew as big as the barn. Then...
1141.title: Just like in the cartoons!

Lucky suddenly grew so large he broke through the barn's roof! He looked around seeing how large he was now. "This is pretty cool!" he said before looking down at Mooch and his gang, he reached down first and grabbed Two-tone and placed her on his head. Two-Tone looked at Lucky seeing him so big.

"Lucky! Your huge!" Two-Tone said in suprise and shock

"shh! don't let Mooch know" Lucky wagged before lifting the wagon up and peering inside, the three terrified dogs inside gulped as they saw Lucky's huge eye looking at them.

"Don't eat us!" Mooch whimpered.

"Yeah! uhhh we don't taste good!" Dipstick said gulping

Wizzer started to have an accident "yeah! I don't wanna be a snack!" Wizzer yelled

Lucky laughed as he shook the wagon up, the three dogs inside screamed and held on for dear life before Lucky got an idea. "Hey Two-Tone I got an idea" he said to Two-Tone whom was on his head still

"What's the idea?" Two-Tone asked

123.content: What Can she use to inflate herself?
123.title: Inflation

1231.content: Cadpig was walking through the Dearly Farm. "Ah, what a beautiful day." she said after taking a big sniff of the summer breeze. Then, Dipstick, one of Mooch's goons, watched Cadpig go by using his binoculars and said, "Hahaha! Right into my trap!" Then, Cadpig saw a big bowl of kibble and said, "Well, I am getting hungry. Time for Breakfest." She went up to the bowl and ate some kibble. Meanwhile, Dipstick used a lever to push the giant boulder and rolled down toward where Cadpig is eating. Before she had time to react, Cadpig got flattened by the big boulder and weakly said, "Owch!!" Dipstick walked down to where Cadpig got flattened with an air pump and said, "Oh, sorry. Did I flatten you? Here, lemme help you up." He shoved the hose into her mouth and started pumping. Cadpig slowly returned to normal shape and tried to remove the hose from her mouth, but it's stuck. "Oops," said Dipstick, "Forgot to metion that I dip some super glue into the hose." Cadpig was shocked as Dipstick kept pumping her up. Her cheeks swelled up like balloons and her body slowly puffed up into a balloon. Then...
1231.title: Dipstick's Dirty Tricks.

choices: She got so big, she broke through the warehouse.
The tank quickly ran out of helium.
1232.content: Cadpig was wandering in the forest, when suddenly, she hears a hising noise and goes inside to investigate. Inside the warehouse, she looked up and saw giant inflated versions of Lucky, Rolly, Spot, Scorch, Two-Tone and etc. Then, Scorch arrive and Cadpig yelled, "You did this to them?" Scorch shoved the hose into her mouth and turned on the gas. As Cadpig's cheecks puffed up, she grabed the hose and tries to remove it from her mouth. But, she can't get it out and saw scorch laughing as he points at the bucket of super glue. Cadpig was horrified as she inflated and puffed up like a balloon. Her arms, legs, belly and even her tail swelled up as she floated upwards to join the others. Then...
1232.title: Cadpig and the puppy balloon warehouse.

1233.content: What else can she use?
1233.title: Other

124.content: How does she become giant sized?
124.title: Macro/Giantess

choices: It worked and she was half the size of the chow tower!
It worked and she already reached the size of the chow tower!
It didn't work, so she tried again!
1241.content: Cadpig was eating kibble at the chow tower. "Mmmm..." said Cadpig gleefully, "I love kibble! It's a great day to be happy and friendly to others. Nothing can ever ruin this day." Suddenly, she heard loud stomping sound. "What was that?" she thought, "Was it an elephant?" Then, a loud booming voice shouted, "Wrong, shrimp!" "Shrimp? SHRIMP??" yelled Cadpig. "Watch your mouth you..." Then, she paused as a giant white foot crushed her. She reshapped herself and was shocked that the giant white foot belonged to Dipstick who was nearly the size of the entire chow tower. "DIPSTICK?!" she yelled, "How the hell did you get so big?" "Uh...Well..." Dipstick tried to answer her. "ANSWER ME, YOU BIG MEANINE!" yelled Cadpig. "DIPSTICK!" yelled another booming voice. Dipstick looked and saw Wizzer and Mooch giant sized as well. Wizzer is the same size as Wizzer, however Mooch was the biggest since he twice the size of the chow tower. "You idiot!" yelled Mooch, "Have you already forgot that we blew on our tails to become giants? Remember?" "Oh yeah!" Dipstick replied, "I forgot." "Blowing on your tails?" said Cadpig. "Oh," Wizzer yelpped as he tried to hold in his pee. "Wizzer? Don't even think about it." Mooch threatened Wizzer. "You know what happened last time." "You're right." Wizzer said, "I've got to go into the ocean." Wizzer ran away to go take a Wizz. Mooch said, "Good luck blowing on your tail, CadShrimp!" yelled Mooch as he walked away. "Hey!" yelled Dipstick, "Wait for me!" Dipstick followed Mooch. Cadpig took her tail took a very deep breath causing her chest to puff up and blew really hard on her tail. Her face turned red as she was doing this. Then, he stopped blowing and panted for a while. Then, she looked down to see any changes...
1241.title: Cadpig's "BIG" blow up!!!

choices: Yes. She was bigger twice her size
12413.content: Did it work the next time?
12413.title: It didn't work, so she tried again!

1243.content: What else can she use to grow?
1243.title: Other

choices: She decided to leave the stone alone...for now.
124331.content: Cadpig was walking down Hiccup Hole. "It sure is a beautiful day to go swiming." she said with glee. She jumped into the pool and swam under water. Then, she saw something glisten at the bottom of hiccup hole. She swam down and saw a big stone that is 5 times her size. She pulled hard with all her might and said, "It won't budge. If only I were bigger, I'd be able to pull it out." Then, as she pulled hard she felt something tingle inside her. Then, she was growing several inches, then feet. "What's happening to me?" she said. As she finally pulled out the stone, she noticed that the stone is now smaller than her as she continued to grow. "Hey," she said as she looked down and noticed her new size, "I'm getting bigger because of that stone! I wonder how big I will get?"
124331.title: Cadpig's BIG Discovery

1243311.content: "I'll keep it and become really big!" said Cadpig as she emerged out of Hiccup hole and stepped out of it. She is now as tall as the tree and still growing. "Soon, I'll be as tall as the chow tower." said Cadpig triumphantly. Suddenly, "Hey, Cadpig!" said a voice, "How did you get so big?" She looked down and saw...
1243311.title: She decided to keep growing,

12433111.content: "Lucky?" said Cadpig. Lucky was shocked to see Cadpig twice as tall as a tree and still growing. "I found this magic stone in hiccup hole and suddenly, I'm big and getting bigger!" Lucky looked nervous and said, "What if your mom and dad find out about this? They will kill you!" "Don't worry, said Cadpig who reached 50 feet and still growing, "They won't find out. Now, how about..."
12433111.title: Lucky meets CadBIG!

124331111.content: "rubbing my big feet." said Cadpig. "But, you're still growing." said Lucky, "You will be the size of the planet by the time I am done." "JUST DO IT!" yelled Cadpig. Lucky sighed and started rubbing Cadpig's giant feet. Cadpig sighed as she enjoys the foot message. Then...
124331111.title: A massive foot message.

choices: A giant sized Scorched towered over her.
1243311111.content: Lucky stopped rubbing Cadpig's foot. "Why did you stop?" yelled Cadpig. "You're getting to big." yelled Lucky, "because you're about to take up all of the Dearly Farm." Cadpig looked around and saw the Dearly Farm. She's now 6 times bigger than the farm. "Whoa!" she shrieked as she dropped the stone. "I must have become a collosal pup!" She then noticed Lucky running away, grabbed him and yelled, "WHERE DO YA THINK YOU'RE GOING, LUCKY. STOP RUNNING AWAY AND RUB MY FEET NOW!" Lucky whimpered and said, "Ok, Cadpig." "SAY, OK GREAT QUEEN CADPIG OF ALL OF USA!" yelled Cadpig. "Ok, great queen--" Lucky continued to whimper. "LOUDER!!!" yelled Cadpig. "OK, GREAT QUEEN CADPIG OF ALL OF USA!" yelled Lucky. "Good," said Cadpid cheerfully, "Now...GET BACK TO WORK." Lucky rubbed her heat again and just as Cadpig was about to enjoy her foot message...
1243311111.title: Lucky stopped rubbing Cadpig's feet

choices: Lucky arrived to see Queen Pup and CadBIG
Mooch arrived to see Queen Pup and CadBIG
12433112.content:
Two-Tone suddenly walked up and saw Cadpig growing, she gasped "Cadpig! your huge!" Two-tone said to her sister

"The bigger, the better." Cadpig grinned. Two-Tone noticed an odd stone and approached it. Cadpig glared at her as she did so

"Cool, I wonder what this is?" Two-Tone placed her paws on the stone, she blinked as she could feel how warm it is. "Wow, I wonder if this is one of those wish granting stones? If so then I wish I were the biggest dalmatian puppy in the whole world." Two-Tone said as a joke before she suddenly began to grow,

"I got a bad feeling about this." Cadpig gulped as Two-Tone grew to her size.

"Wow!" Two-Tone grinned as she was huge. "I feel large and in charge." She said.

"Now what will you do?" Cadpig asked

"What else? To take over." Two-Tone answered "Cause Queen Pup demands it!" The large pup shouted

just then.....
12433112.title: Enter Queen Pup

choices: We're gonna have him massage our giant sized paws.
124331121.content:
As he was unaware that his two sisters had grown to a gigantic size as Lucky was about to find himself between a rock and a hard place.

"I wonder where my sisters Cadpig and Two-Tone are? Whoa ho...uh." Lucky asked as both Cadbig and Queen Pup both giant stepped towards Lucky as their shadows loomed over him as he worriedly looked up at his giant sized sisters.

"Ah gee uh you look two look rather beautiful today especially you Two-Tone." Lucky said as he nervously complemented his two giant sisters.

Queen Pup then grabbed her brother as he worriedly looked at Queen Pup herself.

"What should we have our brother do for us Cadbig?" Queen Pup asked her sister.

"I know what our brother should do for us in other words...." Cadbig said.
124331121.title: Lucky arrived to see Queen Pup and CadBIG

Spot is jealous of duchess and princess of how big they are and how no one bothers them, so spot looks p at the night sky and sees a star and wishes she was a cow like them to see how life would be if she was a cow not a chicken for a day.

The next morning spot wakes up and she feels heavier then normal she feels weird she looks down and sees hooves, in a shock she is a cow she does not what to think.

154112.content: How about a wishing collar?

1541121.content: One day, Two-Tone was looking through some boxes that the Dearlys had put out for donation. She was looking for something to impress Lucky. Then, she comes across a shiny dog collar amd looked at the dog tag's writng that was on the back. It stated that who ever wears this collar can have the wishes coome true. Two-Tone placed the collar on her and wanted to see if it work and she wished...
1541121.title: Magic Dog collar

choices: Cadpig, Rolly, and Spot walked up and saw Two-Tone and Lucky all grown up
Mooch, Dipstick, and Wizzer walked up and freaked at Two-tone and lucky grown up
15411211.content:
"I wish I was grown up" Two-tone said as a joke as the collar glowed making her grow into an adult, she gasped "How did I.....? My voice!" Two-Tone gasped, her voice was that of an adult dog rather than her puppy self, she panicked as Lucky walked over.

"Two-Tone what happened?!" Lucky said in shock.

"This collar, it made my wish come true, it made me grow up!" Two-Tone said terrified.

"Hey can I try?" Lucky asked. Two-Tone handed Lucky the collar, Lucky buckled it on and wagged

"I wish I was all grown up too!" Lucky said as he grew up as well "Whoa....... hey! my voice! It's deeper! Man this thing worked!" Lucky wagged. just then...
15411211.title: Unexpected Growth Spurt

choices: Swamp Rat had stolen the collar
154112111.content:
As the dalmatians enjoyed their new adult bodies they were unaware Cadpig, Rolly, and Spot were about to see them all grown up. The two dal pups and spot all stared in shock seeing Lucky and Two-Tone all grown up as they laughed and had a good time before they saw their siblings and their chicken friend. "Uhh guys....... we can explain." Lucky said nervously.

"Lucky how did you and Two-Tone grow up??" Cadpig asked

"How does it feel Luck?" Rolly asked

"A collar Two-Tone found, it made us both adults! We can do what we want when we want!" Lucky told Cadpig and Rolly

"What about us?? I mean you two seem happy to be all grown up" Spot told Lucky as she looked at him.

"Well...... you guys can grow up too with that collar Two-Tone found" Lucky pointed at the collar.

"It's magic and grants our wishes, we plan to use it to become puppies again later on." Two-Tone told the pups before she gasped, the collar was gone!

Who could have stolen it?
154112111.title: Discovery!

choices: Nilly then proceeds to feed them.
Nilly gives them lots of hugs and tells them what good babies they are
15412.content:
Two-tone was over at the yard sale box again, she went through the clothes and sighed, she was very bored today. The other pups were off doing their own thing. Two-tone climbed out of the box "Everybody seems to be so busy today" she said to herself as she headed to the barn, maybe some TV would relax her. She walked into the barn looking bored before noticing something inside the barn, a figure she never seen before. The figure a man welding a strange device in his hands approached Two-Tone, the frightened pup backs off before the device glowed in the man's hands, Two-Tone covered her eyes as she was engulfed by the bright glow from the device.

Two-Tone woke up to find herself in a strange room, she blinked noticing she wasn't the only one in the room, she saw Lucky and went to him and nudged him awake "Lucky? Where are we?" Two-Tone asked

"Dunno, last I remember was coming back home from Hiccup Hole and seeing this wierd guy show up, next thing I know I'm here." Lucky told Two-Tone as they saw the door opening. Inside the room entered a small figure, a little girl, she looked five years old from appearence. She smiled and picked the puppies up.

"Hello puppies" she said in a sweet sounding tone as she hugs the two puppies. "We are going to have so much fun together" she giggled as she took the two pups away from the room. The pups soon found themselves with the girl and far away from their home as they entered the girl's home and into her room, the girl smiled "I'm Nilly, and I am sure happy to have you two, now you two are going to be my babies and I'll be your mommy" Nilly said setting the pups in a crib, she then diapers them and dresses them in bonnets and booties on their paws. "Aren't you both just adorable?" Nilly said as she showed the pups what they looked like, they blushed
15412.title: Being a baby

choices: Nilly checks their diapers and sees they need a diaper change
Nilly plays with them some more
154121.content:
Nilly then feeds them both by giving them a warm bottle of milk, after the pups ate they are then laid over Nilly's shoulder and patted till they burped. "Good babies" Nilly said to the pups as she laid them in the crib and left them alone in the room

"Two-Tone we gotta get out of here." Lucky told Two-Tone

"But why? It's kinda fun to be a baby, you get fed, get lots of attention, and these diapers feel nice and soft. I wanna stay" Two-Tone told Lucky.

Lucky nodded to Two-Tone "Well okay, just cause you wanna and I don't like seeing you sad." Lucky nuzzled Two-Tone as Nilly entered the room again
154121.title: Nilly then proceeds to feed them.

info.brief_description: Do just about anything and everything to the animals on the Dearly Farm!
info.description:
Age Lucky into an adult? Make Cadpig into a GTS? Turn Rolly skinny or inflate like a balloon? Transform Spot into various animals? Do that and more here and create the scenarios!

Rules to establish:

1. Anything goes except for shrinkage and WG. I believe there is too much of this on the site
2. Sex is allowed. No gay/lesbianism and no scat/watersports and toilet humor.
3. No killing characters
4. This is focused on the animals, not the humans. They can be involved though.
5. Have fun!
